vote.title: Honoring Lynda Leclerc for 30 Years of Service
vote.description:
Title
 
Honoring Lynda Leclerc for 30 Years of Service
 
Body
 
WHEREAS, Lynda Leclerc has devoted 30 years of exemplary service to Huckleberry House, dedicating her career to supporting youth in crisis and strengthening families in our community; and
 
WHEREAS, throughout her tenure, Lynda has embodied the mission, vision, and values of Huckleberry House, ensuring that vulnerable young people are met with safety, dignity, and hope; and
 
WHEREAS, her leadership, professionalism, and tireless advocacy have had a lasting impact not only on the lives of thousands of youth and families served, but also on her colleagues, community partners, and the greater Central Ohio community; and
 
WHEREAS, Lynda has been a cornerstone of Huckleberry House, contributing to its growth, stability, and reputation as a trusted resource for more than five decades; and
 
WHEREAS, the City Council wishes to recognize the extraordinary commitment of individuals who dedicate their lives to public service and community betterment;
 
NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT RESOLVED, that Columbus City Council  on behalf of all its residents, does hereby commend and thank Lynda Leclerc for her 30 years of outstanding service to Huckleberry House and the youth of our community, and extends its best wishes for her continued success and fulfillment.
